description: Teamwork is a work and project management tool that helps teams improve collaboration, visibility, and accountability.

actions.name: add_people_to_project
actions.description: Add existing users to a project.

actions.name: create_company
actions.description: Create a new company in Teamwork.

actions.name: create_expense
actions.description: Log new expense in a project with cost, description, date.

actions.name: create_message_reply
actions.description: Post a reply in a message thread.

actions.name: create_milestone
actions.description: Add a milestone with due date, description, responsible user, etc.

actions.name: create_notebook_comment
actions.description: Add a comment on a notebook (collaborative document) with optional attachments.

actions.name: create_person
actions.description: Create a new user/contact (name, email, invite options).

actions.name: create_project
actions.description: Create a new project (name, description, belongs to company, dates, etc.).

actions.name: create_stage
actions.description: Add a new stage in a workflow or board.

actions.name: create_task_comment
actions.description: Leave a comment in a task.

actions.name: create_task_list
actions.description: Add a new task list under a project.

actions.name: create_task
actions.description: Add a new task under a project with description, due date, assignee, tags, etc.

actions.name: create_time_entry_on_task
actions.description: Log time spent on a task with duration, description.

actions.name: find_company
actions.description: Search for a company by name or domain.

actions.name: find_milestone
actions.description: Find a milestone by name or due date in a project.

actions.name: find_notebook_or_comment
actions.description: Locate notebooks or note comments by search parameters.

actions.name: find_task
actions.description: Search for tasks.

actions.name: mark_task_complete
actions.description: Set a task’s status to complete.

actions.name: update_task
actions.description: Modify a task’s fields (due date, assignee, content, priority, etc.).

actions.name: upload_file_to_project
actions.description: Upload a file to a Teamwork project.

triggers.name: new_comment
triggers.description: Fires when a new comment is posted.

triggers.name: new_expense
triggers.description: Fires when a new expense entry is added.

triggers.name: new_file
triggers.description: Fires when a new file is added.

triggers.name: new_invoice
triggers.description: Fires when a new invoice is created.

triggers.name: new_message
triggers.description: Fires when a new message is posted (in project messages or discussions).

triggers.name: new_person
triggers.description: Fires when a new person (user/contact) is added.

triggers.name: new_task
triggers.description: Fires when a task is created.
